thread.section_title: W Paris - Opera - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful Place!
thread.title_full: Wonderful Place! - Review of W Paris - Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Anm77
title: Wonderful Place!
text:
Excellent hotel and a very convenient location! The staff was very friendly and helpful.
Very clean , comfortable, and beautiful inside! Close to shopping and site-seeing! It is right across the street from the Opera house and in walking distance of the shopping area and the site-seeing buses as well as the subway.
Highly recommend!
